branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder - Mechanically Jointed - w/ Protective Cover
branchCategory.description: <p>The rodless cylinder with a protective cover type are good when the cylinder is exposed to powder, dust and water drops. &nbsp;The protective cover only minimally adds to the overall length and width.</p>

breadCrumb.name: Rodless Cylinder - Mechanically Jointed - w/ Protective Cover

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1*W, Mechanically Jointed - w/ Protective Cover
branchItem.description: <p>The MY1W Rodless Cylinders have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure combined with an outer dust cover for dustproofing and water resistance. A side seal option is available for added protection in harsher environments. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a low profile. It is available in either an integrated slide bearing guide for lateral stability providing to protect from side load impacts or an integrated cam follower guide to provide smooth and precise slide table movement. Air cushions are standard and external shock absorbers are optional.</p>
